column4: RPT-Tesla temporarily shuts down Model 3 production in Fremont
column5: April 16 Tesla Inc on Monday said it was having a planned downtime on the Model 3 production  after a BuzzFeed report said the carmaker had temporarily shut down Model 3 production in the company's Fremont  California  plant without warning.

column4: Qualcomm to refile China antitrust application for $44 billion NXP takeover: sources
column5: BEIJING U.S. chipmaker Qualcomm  will refile as early as Monday an application with the Chinese government to clear its $44 billion takeover of NXP Semiconductors   sources said  giving regulators more time to decide on the deal and averting a collapse.
